reviewText: Great video, very detailed!
this DVD is a wonderful introduction to ballet for all beginners and advance dancers that need a refresh.
Such a Great teaching!  Love how the steps were explained and shown!

I always wanted to take ballet classes ! the ballet 1 DVD made it so convenient for me to learn right in my home with Lynn Hayden easy to understand instructions and demonstrations made it fun and easy to for me learn !!!!
The video provides a very clear and concise explanation and demonstration of ballet technique.  It is wonderful tool to own and to share with other dances lovers.

This DVD is a fantastic introduction to ballet. It's the ballet class I've always wanted to participate in but never had the opportunity. Having very little prior ballet experience, I appreciate Pastor Lynn's clear and detailed instructions on each move and I found great satisfaction in learning the names of the moves as well as proper technique. This video is going to give me a solid ballet foundation that I know will enhance and strengthen my dancing.
This video is great a full course of ballet is taught in just 2 hours. It is broken down so that it is easily understood. If you want to learn ballet this is a great video to have.

The video is great at teaching a basic beginner the basic principles of ballet and makes it easy to learn. I enjoyed everything from the ballet positions, to body positions, to tendu, to frappe, and many more. Highly recommend it!

The video is great at teaching a basic beginner the basic principles of ballet and makes it easy to learn. I enjoyed everything from the ballet positions, to body positions, to tendu, to frappe, and many more. Highly recommend it!

Pros: This video is so amazing. I have no experience in ballet at all but watching this video totally help me to understand the language of movement. My body language would never be the same as well all future choreographies.

This video definite teaches you ballet in depth and takes you step by step.  Pastor Lynn makes it very easy to grasp the concepts of ballet!
For people likes me who has zero experience in ballet , I find this ballet I DVD very helpful. With Pastor Lynn's scaffolding instructions, it makes me feel like I could really be a worship dancer !

Having no dance background AT ALL, I found this DVD to be very helpful in explaining the different components of the basics of ballet. I'm surprised that when I follow the instructions how great of a workout for my core muscles in the basic ballet moves. These are great tools for me as I want so much to build on my dance vocabulary and moves.

this DVD is a wonderful introduction to ballet for all beginners and advance dancers that need a refresh

Excellent!! As I watched, I felt like she was in the room with me. Well taught, with clear & detailed teaching leaving NO room for confusion. This DVD is for any dancer from a beginner to the one that's been dancing for years. For all types of dance, it's something everyone can learn or use as a refresher!!
As a beginner the broad content and instruction provided comfort and confidence regarding my ability to learn from it.
As a beginner the broad content and instruction provided comfort and confidence regarding my ability to learn from it.

It is a great DVD for beginners that have little or no knowledge of ballet dancing!  I practiced the exercises which was difficult at the beginning as my body was stiff.  Gradually, it was easier and I began to sense my body becoming easier to move with the instructions.  I believe the big part is how Ps Lynn was careful and clear in her instructions. Her approach was very inviting and cautioning what not to do as a first timer learning to articulate in body movements.
It is a thorough teaching in just one DVD for a beginner teaching from the Basics  to the Straight Dancing of Ballet!

I enjoyed the instruction and appreciated that Lynn reminds us to work at our own level.

I'm so grateful for a tool like this for people like me who have little dance background.  The instructions are kept simple and yet the moves are great for a solid core workout.  I had no idea that simple movements in Ballet used so much of our body's core muscles.

Excellent video!  Full of easy-to-follow instructions and technique that anyone can learn. It was through this video that I had my first encounter with ballet!  It teaches the basics of ballet, exercise and a wonderful workout complied at the end.  A must have for your collection!!
The instruction is given with care for the learning of the student. It was easy to follow and helped in learning the basics of ballet plus it is a great workout.

Wow this video is awesome, I never taken a ballet class before & I felt good like I was in a formal class. Not overwhelming, you can keep up.

Easy to follow instructions
Nice steady pace
Great for beginners

Ballet 1 by Dancing For Him Ministries is a great review of ballet basics, covering exercises using the barre and the center floor. It is 2 hours long and is broken into three sections including explanation and demonstration of the barre exercises, the floor exercises and the last section is all of the exercises straight through. My favorite part about this DVD was that she breaks down the ballet vocabulary, making it easier to remember. The presentation of the DVD is also very positive and encouraging. I am a worship dancer and found this DVD to be a great source to give me a good understanding of ballet basics in a format that was easy to use and follow. I highly recommend!

Great video.  Simple and easy to understand but very well taught. No matter what age or dance experience this is a great video to own. I have owned this video for about a month.

It is a SO EASY and STEP BY STEP teaching of Ballet Level 1. If you always wanted to dance as a ballerina but without fear and with peace. This DVD is just perfect for you. It is a great ressource for all ages and type of body.

The Ballet 1 video by Pastor Lynn Hayden from Dancing for him ministries. Have been beautifully delivered from beginning to the end of the video.  I love the way she clearly and patiently teaches each exercise/technique and define them from the barre, center and foot exercises.  The video is a great investment.

This resource provided me with strong foundational teaching on ballet.  You don't just learn the form, but also the "language" of ballet positions and their meaning; in this way you will appreciate what you are doing while you are dancing.  Clear, step-by-step instructions followed by a full demonstration to music.  It motivated me to participate because they made it look easy. ~ P. Hatchett

Clear, step-by-step instructions followed by a full demonstration to music.  It motivated me to participate because they made it look easy. ~ P. Hatchett

I have danced for years but I never had Ballet instruction. This DVD is helping me to get some fundamentals! I love that the DVD 1st teaches you slowly then repeats exercises and at the end a full class. It is well done. A great tool to learn basic ballet steps.

The Ballet 1 video by Pastor Lynn Hayden from Dancing for him ministries. Have been beautifully delivered from beginning to the end of the video.  I love the way she clearly and patiently teaches each exercise/technique and define them from the barre, center and foot exercises.  The video is a great investment.

For someone who hasn't had much experience in ballet, Ballet I is great! It is a step-by-step video. First, I learned the room basics of the four corners and the wall positions. After that it went into how the class is structured as in: What would be in a ballet studio if you would ever walk into one. There was the ballet bar and knowing what foot you would start on. It also had great exercises to practice. Don't pass this by.

It not only teaches the basic ballet exercises for a student but also good techniques and teaching example, for those who desire to teach or for those who want to improve their teaching methods.

This is an excellent DVD for those who like me have never done ballet before. Not only did I learn the basics, but now I love ballet and feel inspired to take further classes. Thank you for this amazing DVD.

Love it, very helpful this video is great it is broken down so that it is easily understood. A full course of ballet in this 2hr. video.

Ballet 1 is a very good DVD for beginners in dancing. Pastor Lynn teaches you the basic of ballet. She also teaches how to move across the room using the 8 count, how to keep balance and proper posture. This is a must have DVD in your library.
Good introduction to ballet!
This is a great DVD for learning ballet. It is easy to follow especially if you have never had any dance experience

The Ballet I DVD was set up in a way that I felt was very helpful to me as a beginner in the area of ballet.  What I appreciated the most about this DVD was that it was progressive. I was also impressed with explanations and demonstrations of the different positions with Lynn Hayden taking the time to point out or make mention of some of the barriers and the areas in which I should make sure to be aware of while engaging in the moves and positions. .  I feel as if a lot of thought was put into the making of this DVD in order for people like myself to feel more confident throughout the progression of the DVD.
Great for new beginners of ballet, easy to follow I love how simple the instructor and the the ballerinas makes it look. I am have never taken ballet so this give me a good foundation.
Excellent Instruction and presentation.  I was able to follow the steps even though I never took ballet in my life.  When I attempted some of the steps, I exclaimed, "Wow....I am doing ballet!!!"

Ballet I - Video Download

Length of ownership: 1 month-1 year

Pros: Wonderful video!!!! The information in the video is very easy to understand. It is presented in a teaching format that will work for anyone. I have no experience with ballet and was able to learn many things. I really enjoyed this video!!! I highly recommend it to anyone who has an interest in dance or ballet.

Cons: None

Excellent DVD for beginners. Good teaching and recommendations.

I'm an adult ballet beginner and purchased this based on the high reviews.  The setting is in church, using chairs instead of a barre.  The instructor gives very clear instructions and the two dancers are very good and easy to follow. I have watched it now every day since purchasing.  The only thing I don't like is the prayer at the end but otherwise Ms. Hayden does a great job as a teacher.
